name: Quantile
description:
Created in 48 hours for the first Jim Jam!

The theme was "inspiration", so this game was inspired by a few others: Rez, Star Fox, SUPERHYPERCUBE and Mario Kart.

Avoid obstacles and collect pickups to survive.  The game is sound-reactive, so be aware of the soundtrack!

The track is publicly available, feel free to use it as you wish in any future projects: https://soundcloud.com/nailgun-acupuncture/spacenoodle
